name: SocietyOfMind
description: [SocietyOfMind](http://github.com/theProphet/SocietyOfMind) is a *complete* information model to make a p2p network and 3-d visualization layer that can scale to billions, re-make the Internet, and form a meta-mind for the planet.  For the full scope of the project and philosophy see the [wiki](http://pangaia.sourceforge.net/).
